text: John Pattison (1851-1918) was the Dean of Ardfert from 1916 to 1918."The Church of Ireland in County Kerry" Murphy, J.A. p243: Cork, Lulu, 2016 Pattison was educated at Trinity College, Dublin and ordained in 1884.Crockford's Clerical Directory 1929/30 p 1101 Oxford: OUP, 1908 He began his ecclesiastical career with a curacy at Kiltallagh. He was Rector of Kilcolman from 1886 to 1892; and then of Listowel until his death . He was Precentor of Ardfert Cathedral from 1905 to 1916. He died on 15 August 1918. ==References== Category:Alumni of Trinity College Dublin Category:Deans of Ardfert Category:1851 births Category:1906 deaths
title: John Pattison (priest)
